definition: to treat as/to regard as/to look upon as
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance

sentences.english: I still tend to move my fingers, almost subconsciously, when doing arithmetic.
sentences.chinese: 當做算術時，幾乎是下意識的，我還是會想去掰手指。

sentences.english: These changes simply couldn't be dismissed as coincidences.
sentences.chinese: 這些改變不能被簡單地當做巧合。

sentences.english: Don't consider me as CEO. Consider me as your project manager.
sentences.chinese: 不要把我當成CEO，就當做是一個項目經理。

sentences.english: I decided to treat his remark as jok .
sentences.chinese: 我把他的話當做玩笑話。

sentences.english: You see the ecclesia is the "house of God".
sentences.chinese: 我們把教會當做“神的家”。

sentences.english: The manner of folding a letter, for example, may embody a studied affront.
sentences.chinese: 比如信紙的折法，稍有不慎，就會被當做故意冒犯。

sentences.english: Hoffenheim were instantly dismissed by many as cannon fodder after their promotion last season.
sentences.chinese: 霍芬海姆上賽季升入甲級伊始就被衆球隊當做是炮灰。

sentences.english: The oleanders are planted in the gardens as the ornamental flowers.
sentences.chinese: 夾竹桃被許多人當做觀賞花養在家裏啊。

sentences.english: Aren't you afraid of being put into jail as the perpetrator?
sentences.chinese: 你就不怕被當做肇事者扔進班房嗎？

sentences.english: The enemy desecrate the church by using it as a stable.
sentences.chinese: 敵人褻瀆這所教堂，把它當做馬廄。

sentences.english: I sometimes eat fruit salad as supper.
sentences.chinese: 我有時候把水果沙拉當做我的晚餐。

sentences.english: He thought of his paper as a pulpit.
sentences.chinese: 他當初把這份報紙當做一個講道壇。

sentences.english: So in some sense, in this sort of situation, the photons should be considered one of the reactants.
sentences.chinese: 這種條件在某種意義下，應該把光子也當做反應物。

sentences.english: And they, too, are thought to have superhuman powers when it comes to making money.
sentences.chinese: 當談到掙錢時，他們也被當做是擁有超能力的異類。

sentences.english: When this is done, chlorinated byproducts such as furans and dioxins are produced.
sentences.chinese: 當做到這一點，氯化副產品，如二噁英和呋喃的生產。

sentences.english: See failure as a stepping stone to success.
sentences.chinese: 把失敗當做通往成功的墊腳石。
